TODAY'S ACTIVITY SCHEDULE
See Details
FOOD & BEVERAGE
12:00 pm - 10:00 pm
GUEST SERVICES
9:00 am - 10:00 pm
Food and Beverage
The Whitewater Center offers several full-service, fast casual and grab-and-go outlets for food and drinks on the 1,300-acre property.
River’s Edge
A full-service dining option featuring a wide selection of food, beer, and wine inside or on the patio overlooking our man-made whitewater river.
The Trail Center
Stop by after a day in the woods to grab a drink and refuel. The Trail Center offers a variety of grab and go and hot food options.
Outfitters
Stop by the counter for a selection of one of our rotating craft beers on tap. A selection of snacks and nutritional products are available.
Pump House Biergarten
Located on Belmont Abbey Island, the Pump House Biergarten offers as many as forty craft beers on tap and a variety of made-to-order food options. Guests can sit down to enjoy a meal or a drink while overlooking the paddlers on the Competition Channel.
Wildwoods Cabin
Natalie’s Juice Company and craft-beer on tap, plus snacks and grab-and-go food items. Located within Wildwoods.
Barley House
Enjoy food, treats, and beer — with offerings for both people and their dogs. Located within Off Leash.
The Market
Featuring several quick grab-and-go options including sandwiches, salads, craft beer and more. The outdoor bar is open during special events and concerts with a variety of craft beer and wine available.
Company Info
Employment
Contact
FAQ's

jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
var hideSubnavItems = [];
/* page anchors */
if( $('[data-section]').length > 0 ) {
var tabs = '';
var tabsArr = [];
$('[data-section]').each(function(){
var name = $(this).attr('data-section');
var id = $(this).attr("id");
var slug = name.toLowerCase().trim().replace(/\s+/g, "-").replace(/[^\w-]+/g, "");
var nameArr = name;
if( hideSubnavItems.length ) {
if ($.inArray(slug, hideSubnavItems) !== -1) {
//Do nothing...
nameArr = '';
} else {
tabs += '<span class="mini-nav"><a href="#'+id+'">'+name+'</a></span>';
//tabsArr.push(nameArr);
});
if( $("#pageTabs").length>0 ) {
$("#pageTabs").html('<div class="wrapper"><div id="tabcontent">'+tabs+'</div></div>');
$("#pageTabs").show();
